programme.title: Dear Santa
programme.desc: Crystal comes from a wealthy family and loves spending her parent's money. When they decide it's time for her to make something of her life they give her until Christmas to clean up her act.

programme.title: Christmas in The Heartland
programme.desc: Kara and Jessie strike up an unlikely friendship when seated next to each other on a plane headed to the heartland. With both girls visiting family they've never met, they devise a plan to switch places for Christmas.

programme.title: The Christmas Dance
programme.desc: After having a traumatizing holiday history, Sarah learns to love Christmas again.

programme.title: Holiday Breakup
programme.desc: A couple falls crazy in love, only to break up right before all the big holiday parties. It's Suckville, so they pretend to still be mad for each other instead of mad at each other. It's the perfect plan-if they don't fall back in love.

programme.title: Holiday Engagement
programme.desc: Hillary Burns (Somerville) is always struggling in life and love while constantly feeling the pressure to marry from her demanding mother, Meredith (Long).

programme.desc: Santa Fake is a musical comedy filled with Christmas spirit and holiday hijinks.
